alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 15 at 10:51AM CST until December 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...From this evening to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Water begins to affect Burnside Lake Water Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 13.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 12.6 Thu 9 am CST 13.5 13.2 12.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CST.
